desc: This course builds on the concepts and components of Modern Dance I and II. Open to majors and other students with instructor's permission. Prerequisite: Dance 210/211 or 250/251 (at least twice) and/or permission of the instructor. Offered each semester. 311 may be repeated with permission of instructor.
name: Modern III
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Dance 210/211 or 250/251 (at least twice) and/or permission of the instructor. Offered each semester. 311 may be repeated with permission of instructor.
